Help Save the Tree Trout

Activities

Explore · Learn · Steward

Try These

  • Fog-Drip Mapping: observe condensation and micro-pools after storms.
  • Canopy Creature Bingo: identify moths, squirrels, salamanders.
  • Moss-Pool Stewardship: avoid disturbances; share guidelines with hikers.
  • Storytelling Night: folklore about arboreal species and forest hydrology.

View our Kid-Friendly Forest Walk Guide for young explorers and their tall friends.
